tooltips.apiKey: Account-level API token from Chatwoot. Automatically populated when an automation user is created. Required for contact synchronization. Can be manually set from: Chatwoot → Profile Settings → Access Token.
tooltips.automationUserId: The Chatwoot user ID of the automation user created for this account.
tooltips.automationUserEmail: The email address of the automation user. Use this to login to Chatwoot if needed.
tooltips.autoPendingEnabled: When enabled, conversations will automatically move to 'Pending' status after an agent sends a message. This helps track conversations waiting for customer response.
